channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Balancing AI: How Leaders Can Drive Innovation Without Compromising Ethics
item.description: The speed of AI innovation means that new ethical challenges crop up constantly.

item.title: Embodied energy

item.title: Robots In The Enterprise: Why Adoption Is Crucial, Yet Lagging
item.description: Advancements in AI and sensor technology have significantly enhanced robot capabilities, making them more dependable and easier to operate.
